page.title: 14PETS
page.content: I own 2 rabbits they are called Buffy and Smudge.They are brothers and they are about 1 year old.They both love rabbit food and bread.They are cleaned out once a week, they are not very tame as they scratch.Our class looks after 2 animals.Kevin the Gerbil and Errol the Hamster.We have a rota to see who looks after them each week Kevin lives in a fish tank filled with peat, he likes to dig,Errol likes to sleep and eat.Andrea and I went round the school asking people what pets they kept. The most popular pets were fish and the least popular was a terrapin with lots of people keeping dogs and cats.
